Hi
I am new here and have couple of questions. First of all thank you
guys!=
 This software looks pretty good! 
I need a crawler to go through a website=
 searching for specific
information (e.g. image links or div tags with clas=
s=3D"something") I
wanted to know if this kind of operation is supported in=
 this crawler?
Can I hook some call back function in the crawler ?
I also w=
ould like a tutorial about using it through API, if such a
document exist.
=

Thanks in advance.
-arash
